title: Sweet Magnolias: Joanna Garcia Swisher Shares Why Season 4 Was Her Favorite Season For Maddie

title: Jon Batiste Performs National Anthem Ahead of Super Bowl 59 — Watch and Grade It!
description: Former The Late Show With Stephen Colbert bandleader Jon Batiste got the Super Bowl LIX crowd good and warmed up when he performed “The Star-Spangled Banner” ahead of the big game. The Grammy- and Academy Award winner, a Louisana native, was one of several artists from the state who played Caesars Superdome in New Orleans […]
author: Kimberly Roots

title: 2025 Super Bowl Commercials: All the Touchdowns, Field Goals and Fumbles
description: One needn’t know the difference between a touchdown and a turnover to enjoy the Super Bowl. For many viewers (and we suspect many a TVLine reader), it’s all about the commercials. Each year, advertisers pony up big bucks to wave their wares in front of more than 100 million viewers (even though most ads are now […]
author: Ryan Schwartz
